article_title: Is this a joke, Chuck Schumer? ‘World’s on fire, but hey, Obamacare for pets!’

og.description: Is Senator Chuck Schumer really suggesting Obamacare for pets? Not exactly, but he’s pushing a bill that plants the government’s nose firmly into the veterinarian health care industry. The unpopular New York senator and Sen. Richard Blumenthal, D-Conn., are announcing legislation that would mandate veterinarians write prescriptions to pet owners instead of forcing the owners …
og.title: Is this a joke, Chuck Schumer? 'World's on fire, but hey, Obamacare for pets!'

article_summary:
Is Senator Chuck Schumer really suggesting Obamacare for pets?
W/ @SenBlumenthal — Chuck Schumer (@SenSchumer) July 20, 2014@SenSchumer Glad you have time to screw around with this rather than dealing with the collapse of border security.
@SenSchumer @SenBlumenthal — Jalen (@GOPMommy) July 20, 2014@SenSchumer @SenBlumenthal you two jmokes are embarrassing.
If the Constitution teaches anything, it’s that the Fed needs to step in when pet meds get too expensive!
— Branden Petersen (@Sen_B_Petersen) July 20, 2014@SenSchumer phew!
